attributes.action: Stop the BBC losing the rights to the Grand National
attributes.additional_details: The goverment must step in and stop the BBC losing the rights to the Grand National. The Grand National is the one horserace every year where most of the country has a bet. The BBC always gives the people of this country an afternoon of TV dedicated to this great sporting event. This must continue CH4 do a good job with horseracing but they wont dedicate the day or even the programme to this great race and you can guarntee that they will have advert breaks just before and just after the race taking away the atmosphere of this great occassion
